notes: Declared style aligns directly with BJCP 21A American IPA and the Brewers Association American-Style India Pale Ale.
Declared style maps to the classic Belgian witbier specification in both guideline sets.
Imperial stout terminology is shared between BJCP 20C and the BA American-Style Imperial Stout category.
Kölsch is explicitly covered in BJCP 5B and Brewers Association German-Style Kölsch.
American Amber Ale corresponds to BJCP 19A and BA American-Style Amber/Red Ale.
